trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Określa, jak wydrukować dokument z aplikacji formularzy systemu Windows.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, PrintController controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Po zaimplementowaniu w klasie pochodnej PrintController kontroli, jak <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>jest drukowana.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>wywołuje kontroler wydruku <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, i <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metody, które z kolei Poinformuj drukarki, jak wydrukować dokument.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized PrintController.
trans-unit.target: Podgląd wydruku używa PrintController specjalne.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład kontroler wydruku, które jest przeznaczone do podglądu wydruku, zobacz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: PrintController is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: PrintController jest używany przez <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>i zazwyczaj nie używać bezpośrednio.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from PrintController that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework obejmuje trzy wydruku kontrolery pochodzących z PrintController ułatwiające wykonywanie typowych zadań.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>Drukuje dokument z drukarką.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>Generuje podgląd dokumentu wygląd po drukowaniu i jest używany przez <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klasy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>Zapewnia drukowania okna dialogowego Stan podczas drukowania.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji dotyczących drukowania w formularzach systemu Windows, zobacz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Omówienie przestrzeni nazw.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli chcesz wydrukuj z aplikacji Windows Presentation Foundation, zobacz <xref:System.Printing>przestrzeni nazw.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą czy <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> służy do podglądu wydruku.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>we wszystkich przypadkach.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku przesłonięcia w klasie pochodnej, zakończeniu sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować strony z dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnEndPage jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wyjątek wewnątrz <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzenia <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, nie jest wywoływana metoda OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wysyłanego do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>po wywołaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Użyj <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodę, aby ustawić jak wydrukować stronę do dokumentu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: For example, można dostosować ustawienia strony osobno dla każdej strony.) Czyści w metodzie OnEndPage <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku przesłonięcia w klasie pochodnej, zakończeniu sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wysyłanego do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>po wywołaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Użyj <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>metodę, aby określić, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład można opóźnić drukowanie w ciągu 30 minut; Dostosuj ustawienia drukarki dla dokumentu) <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy metoda OnEndPrint zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku przesłonięcia w klasie pochodnej, rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować strony z dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPage jest wywoływana bezpośrednio przed <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Tworzy <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wysyłanego do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>jest wywoływana metoda OnStartPage zestawów <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>grafiki pojedynczej strony.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPage method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Użyj metody OnStartPage można ustawić jak wydrukować stronę do dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład można dostosować ustawienia strony osobno dla każdej strony.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> reprezentujący stronę z <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku przesłonięcia w klasie pochodnej, rozpoczyna się sekwencji kontrolki, która określa, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint jest wywoływana natychmiast po wykonaniu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>zgłasza <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPrint method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPrint umożliwia określenie, kiedy i jak wydrukować dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Na przykład można opóźnić drukowanie w ciągu 30 minut lub dostosować ustawienia drukarki dla dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>wysyłanego do drukarki.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Po wywołaniu OnStartPrint <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>zestawy metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>do jednego z pojedynczą stroną.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>Czyści metody <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, podczas gdy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>Metoda zwalnia obiektu.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Metoda OnStartPrint jest dobrym miejscem do sprawdzenia, czy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>są prawidłowe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> reprezentujący aktualnie drukuje dokument.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.
